Class ColorTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • boardgraphics.ColorTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemColorTableModel, OtherColorTableModel

    public abstract class ColorTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    Abstract class to store colors used for drawing the board.

      • getColumnClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> getColumnClass(int p_c)
        JTable uses this method to determine the default renderer/ editor for each cell. If we didn't implement this method, then the last column would contain text ("true"/"false"), rather than a check box.
        Specified by:
        getColumnClass in interface javax.swing.table.TableModel
        Overrides:
        getColumnClass in class javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
